overview: Dive 'Into the Blue' with a cadre of gorgeous men in a luxurious private pool. These studs are hot and as the temperature rises, so does their need for sexual satisfaction. Tony Dimarco directs seven toned, horny studs as they suck, rim fuck, and shoot enormous loads in and next to the stunning waters underneath the bright clear sky.
tagline: For the hottest poolside sex with the sexiest men in the world, just take a deep breath and dive 'Into the Blue.'
title: Into the Blue
